title: Project-Programming Coord. College Networks - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: Work hand-in-hand with Marketing, Production and Communications to help forge and implement effective promotional and social media strategies. Provide strategic and analytical support to Programming Management regarding the on-air   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
